OrgName.entry: UNIVERSITY OF SHEFFIELD - SCHOOL OF EDUCATION, THE INSTITUTE FOR LIFELONG LEARNING

Desc.entry: Provides general interest day, evening and weekend courses specifically for the general public. Also offers a Foundation Programme, part-time certificates, part-time diploma, part-time combined studies degrees and 2 foundation degrees. Offers Credit Accumulation and Transfer Scheme (CATS).

Pubs.entry: Courses for Everyone brochure; Part-time Degree and Certificate brochure

category.entry: EDUCATION - TRAINING PROVIDERS AND EMPLOYMENT SUPPORT
